column2: Choose 'Default' to keep the original size of search field during searching process.

column2: Enable Redirect from 404 to Search Results

column2: If option is enabled, customer will be redirected to the store search results of the broken URL text instead of the '404 Not Found' page

column2: Set 'Yes' to display separate tabs on the Search result page for Category, CMS and Landing pages
